participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is a fun-loving and carefree individual who values his friendships. He's eager to gain independence and often feels overwhelmed by parental expectations.
participant_1.background: i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i've a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. they're constantly on my back.
